channel.title: How?
channel.description:
How i can put my private server public?
And are there guide to add dragon claws + 4spec?
or
guide than if i attack to monster it dont stay stock if i move little voyage farther , but follow little time and attack me.

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @Pehmis Pehmis
item.description:
@Pehmis wrote:

case 2562: TheifStall("gem stall", "and get 6k", 60, 125 * playerLevel[17], 995, 6000, 30, 0x340); break; 
    case 4878:
        TheifStall("scimitar stall", "and recieve 2k", 20,
                100 * playerLevel[17], 995, 2000, 30, 0x340);
        break;

    case 4877:
        TheifStall("magic stall", "and recieve 3k", 40,
                125 * playerLevel[17], 995, 3000, 30, 0x340);
        break;

    case 4876:
        TheifStall("general stall", "and get 1,5k =]", 1,
                70 * playerLevel[17], 1500, 1, 15, 0x340);
        break;

    case 2560:
        TheifStall("silk stall", "and recieve 15k", 90,
                20 * playerLevel[17], 995, 15000, 30, 0x340);
        break;

    case 4705:
        TheifStall("Fish stall", "and recieve a manta ray", 1,
                500 * playerLevel[17], 389, 1, 30, 0x340);
        break;

    case 4706:
        TheifStall("Veg Stall", "and recieve money???", 1,
                500 * playerLevel[17], 995, 100000, 30, 0x340);
        break;

    case 2565:
        TheifStall("silver stall", "and recieve 9k", 80,
                150 * playerLevel[17], 995, 9000, 30, 0x340);
        break;

    case 635:
        TheifStall(".", ".", 1, 5 * playerLevel[17], 995, 250, 30, 0x340);
        break;</blockquote>

And those error came when i editet this quote^^ What is wrong in it`? -.-
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 30, 2009, 11:28:17 am[/size][hr]I make my client folder to rar file and upload it and download it in my second computer, but it not work…

: What files i need to fill in rar file?

Read full topic

Start Utorrent
Start No-IpDUC
